description: Try our easy to follow Apple Crisps recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chips & fries,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Apple,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Apple Crisps Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Slice whole Royal Gala apples into 4mm thick slices and lay in a single layer on baking paper-lined trays. Sprinkle lightly with cinnamon sugar, turning over after 1 hour, until dried out. Store in an airtight container for up to 2 months.
